extensionDescription.message: 偵測或建立目前頁面的縮址。
extensionDescription.description: Detect or create a short URL for the current page.

menuitem_label.description: Context menu item label text for page.

shorten_link_label.description: Context menu item label text for link.

shorten_img_label.description: Context menu item label text for image.

shorten_error.message: 噢不，建立縮址時發生錯誤。
shorten_error.description: Error message when shortening URL was unsuccessful.

apikey_error.message: 偏好設定中沒有輸入 API 金鑰。
apikey_error.description: Error message when shortening service needs an API key and none was provided.

error_host_permission.message: 抱歉，頁面受到瀏覽器限制無法建立縮址。
error_host_permission.description: Error message when running on about: or addons.mozilla.org.

service_title.description: Options: Label for selecting which service (is.gd, ...) to use.

service_none.description: Options: No shortening service, copy found short URL or full URL only.

service_custom.description: Options: Placeholder for custom URL option in dropdown.

bitly_apikey_title.description: Options: Label for Bitly API key text field.

bitly_apikey_description.message: 建立 Bitly API 金鑰
bitly_apikey_description.description: Options: Link to generate Bitly API key.

customurl_title.description: Options: Label for custom URL text field.

customurl_description.message: 使用 %URL% 替代原始 URL 的位置。
customurl_description.description: Options: Help text for custom URL.

shorten_canonical_title.message: 當網址超過以下設定長度時才縮址。
shorten_canonical_title.description: Options: Label for maximum URL length before forcing shortening.

shorten_canonical_description.message: 部份網站如果未達設定長度不會進行縮址。 這裡設定當超過一定長度時才使用縮址服務（0 =  不縮址）。
shorten_canonical_description.description: Options: Help text for forcing shortening of long canonical URLs.

use_special_title.message: 在已知網站中使用特定縮址格式
use_special_title.description: Options: Label for using youtu.be and other special known short URLs.

use_special_description.message: 有些網站有自己的縮址服務，像是 youtu.be。
use_special_description.description: Options: Help text for using special shortening cases.

strip_utm_title.message: 移除網址中的 ?utm_* 參數
strip_utm_title.description: Options: Label for removing known marketing parameters from URLs.

strip_utm_description.message: 商業活動中常常會在 URL 中加入 ?utm_campaign=something ，這可以移除。
strip_utm_description.description: Options: Help text for removing known marketing parameters from URL.

keep_hash_title.description: Options: Label for keeping URL #hash if present.

keep_hash_description.message: 將網址中 #hash 的部份一起加入縮址，像是 mysite.com/page#hash。
keep_hash_description.description: Options: Help text for keeping URL #hash if present.

notify_title.description: Options: Label for showing notification popup when URL was generated.

notify_description.message: 失敗時無論如何都會顯示通知。
notify_description.description: Options: Help text for showing notification popup on success.

copy_title_title.message: 複製時連同網頁標題一起複製
copy_title_title.description: Options: Label for copying page title along with URL.

copy_title_description.message: 像是： 'So why are Pandas so cute? http://nyti.ms/2xGSRyh'
copy_title_description.description: Options: Help text for copying page title with URL.

save_button.description: Options: Button label for save options.

saved_notice.description: Options: Indicator that options were saved.
